long_description: The Butterfly Ultralight wallet weighs only 0.2 oz.-that's less than a U.S. quarter! And it can easily hold 3 bank cards in each of the side pockets and a lot more stuff in the center pocket. There's also a compartment for your cash; you'll be surprised how much the Butterfly can hold if you fill it to the max. 3mm thin when empty. Fully functional and stylish; fun packaging for gift giving. Made from long-lasting ripstop nylon with a water-resistant coating.
